title: The Billionaire Prince's Surprise Son
description: Two years after abruptly leaving his residency in America—and the woman he was falling hard for—Nicolas Frederick Hansen, billionaire and Crown Prince of the Isle of Mynia, is focused on making his country’s pediatric hospital the best in the world. When Nic lost his brother years ago, he drowned his pain in work—and found purpose in following in his brother’s footsteps into pediatric medicine. He adores children, though he’s nowhere near ready to have his own.When former flame Summer Rand shows up at his hospital for a fellowship program, she’s astounded to find that the man who’d cloaked himself in secrecy, and left her without warning, is none other than a Crown prince! Nic’s equally shocked—to learn he has a son named Harry. Determined to make it work, they agree to focus on their child… and the passion that they could never deny. But it isn’t long before dreams of being the perfect family clash with the intense career demands in Nic’s life.Will he be able to make this royal romance work? Or will he lose his shot at a future—and the family—he never thought he could have?USA Today Bestseller Leslie North invites you to indulge in a steamy billionaire romance with an unforgettable bad boy billionaire and the smart-talking woman who tames him…
author: Leslie North
